name: VCraft
description:
Ever wish you could make anything you want, with an unlimited amount of...let's say, cubes? Use VCraft then.

Think of VCraft as Minecraft Creative Mode...except with tons more colors!

Main features include:

  • ability to save and open projects
  • less hardware-intensive
  • many many colors!

How to play:

  • Mouse to turn around, WASD to move, Spacebar to jump
  • Left click to place block, right click to destroy block, scroll to switch colors
  • Press F to enable flying. Spacebar will now let you fly. To disable, press F again.
  • Press C to edit the current color on your palette
  • Press Tab to open the main menu

That's it! Discover you inner creativity today!
